statements: SELECT * FROM quests;
SELECT quest_name, assigned_to FROM quests WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT quest_name, assigned_to FROM quests WHERE quest_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE assigned_to = 'Alice';
SELECT quest_id, quest_name FROM quests WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE quest_id = 1;
SELECT quest_name, assigned_to FROM quests WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT quest_name, assigned_to FROM quests ORDER BY quest_name DESC;
SELECT quest_name, assigned_to FROM quests WHERE assigned_to LIKE 'John%';
SELECT quest_id, quest_name, completion_status FROM quests WHERE completion_status = FALSE ORDER BY quest_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE quest_id = 1;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE assigned_student_id = 2;
SELECT quest_id, quest_name, completion_status FROM quests WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT mission_name, mission_description FROM missions WHERE completion_status = false;
SELECT * FROM quests JOIN missions ON quests.assigned_student_id = missions.assigned_student_id;
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE assigned_student_id = 1 AND completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE quest_id IN (1, 5, 10) ORDER BY quest_id DESC;
SELECT quest_name, mission_name FROM quests INNER JOIN missions ON quests.assigned_student_id = missions.assigned_student_id;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description, mission_name FROM quests LEFT JOIN missions ON quests.assigned_student_id = missions.assigned_student_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_quests, AVG(quest_id) AS avg_quest_id FROM quests WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM quests;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description, completion_status FROM quests;
SELECT mission_name, due_date FROM missions;
SELECT student_name, email, age FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, age, level FROM students;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT mission_name, due_date FROM missions WHERE due_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM quests q JOIN missions m ON q.assigned_to = m.assigned_to;
SELECT student_name, age, level FROM students WHERE level = 2 OR level = 3 ORDER BY age DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 90;
SELECT quest_name, start_date, end_date FROM quests ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, mission_status FROM missions WHERE mission_status = 'ongoing';
SELECT student_name, quest_name, mission_name FROM students s JOIN quest_progress qp ON s.student_id = qp.student_id JOIN missions m ON qp.mission_id = m.mission_id;
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE quest_id = 1;
SELECT mission_name, mission_status FROM missions WHERE mission_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT quest_name, start_date, end_date FROM quests ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, quest_name, mission_name, completion_status FROM students s JOIN quest_progress qp ON s.student_id = qp.student_id JOIN quests q ON qp.quest_id = q.quest_id JOIN missions m ON qp.mission_id = m.mission_id;
SELECT * FROM Quests;
SELECT quest_name, due_date FROM Quests ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, required_level FROM Missions WHERE required_level > 5;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE level < 3;
SELECT student_name, mission_name, assigned_date FROM Students JOIN MissionAssignments ON Students.student_id = MissionAssignments.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Missions;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, required_level FROM Missions WHERE required_level > 5;
SELECT student_name, email, level FROM Students ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM Quests WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(quest_description) > 100;

SELECT s.student_name, m.mission_name, ma.assigned_date FROM Students s JOIN MissionAssignments ma ON s.student_id = ma.student_id JOIN Missions m ON m.mission_id = ma.mission_id WHERE ma.status = 'assigned';
